para.text: NWT: Newton Solver Package Pane
The Newton Solver (NWT) package can only be used in MODFLOW-NWT. It can only be used with the
package. When the
package is used, the Newton Solver package must be used. The pane for this package is on the
dialog box under

The Newton Solver has a large number of possible parameters.For that reason, several different tabs are used to hold the controls used to set those options. However, initially only one tab is visible. The others will appear if they are needed.
The options that are always required are on the
tab.
The options that are required if
Options
is set to "Specified" are on the
tab.
The options that are required if
Options
is set to "Specified" and
LINMETH
is set to GMRES are on the
tab.
The options that are required if
Options
is set to "Specified" and
LINMETH
is set to Chi MD are on the
tab.
When the Well package in MODFLOW-NWT is used, a warning similar to the following will always be printed to the listing file.

para.text: NEGATIVE PUMPING RATES WILL BE REDUCED IF HEAD

para.text: FALLS WITHIN THE INTERVAL PHIRAMP TIMES THE CELL

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: THICKNESS. THE VALUE SPECIFIED FOR PHIRAMP IS 0.10000E+00

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: WELLS WITH REDUCED PUMPING WILL BE REPORTED TO FILE UNIT NUMBER 141
